entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule

[DQR.IFRS.0080.8754] ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalentsClassifiedAsPartOfDisposalGroupHeldForSale has a value of -474,000,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalentsClassifiedAsPartOfDisposalGroupHeldForSale fact are: Period :2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/9695005MSX1OYEMGDF46/2021-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/bpce-2021-12-31-fr.zip/bpce-2021-12-31-fr/reports/bpce-2021-12-31-fr.xhtml 233246

The properties of this ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalentsClassifiedAsPartOfDisposalGroupHeldForSale fact are: Period :2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/9695005MSX1OYEMGDF46/2021-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/bpce-2021-12-31-fr.zip/bpce-2021-12-31-fr/reports/bpce-2021-12-31-fr.xhtml 233239

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInCashAndCashEquivalents All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the following abstracts IncomeTaxesPaidRefundAbstract, CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract, DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract, ChangesInLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract or DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesLineItems.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [210000] Statement of financial position, current/non-current but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:FinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome, bpce:RevaluationDifferencesOnInterestRateRiskHedgedPortfoliosAssets, ifrs-full:NoncurrentAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSale, bpce:AccruedExpensesAndOtherLiabilities, ifrs-full:CashAndBankBalancesAtCentralBanks, ifrs-full:DepositsFromBanks, ifrs-full:InvestmentAccountedForUsingEquityMethod, ifrs-full:FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss, ifrs-full:DeferredTaxAssets, ifrs-full:EquityAndLiabilities, ifrs-full:LiabilitiesDueToCentralBanks, ifrs-full:Goodwill, ifrs-full:DerivativeFinancialAssetsHeldForHedging, ifrs-full:LoansAndAdvancesToCustomers, ifrs-full:DerivativeFinancialLiabilitiesHeldForHedging, ifrs-full:FinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss, ifrs-full:DebtInstrumentsHeld, ifrs-full:CurrentTaxAssets, ifrs-full:LiabilitiesArisingFromInsuranceContracts, bpce:AccruedIncomeAndOtherAssets, ifrs-full:InvestmentProperty, ifrs-full:CurrentTaxLiabilities, bpce:RevaluationDifferencesOnInterestRateRiskhedgedPortfoliosLiabilities, ifrs-full:IntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill, ifrs-full:Assets, ifrs-full:Provisions, ifrs-full:DeferredTaxLiabilities, ifrs-full:LoansAndAdvancesToBanks, ifrs-full:DepositsFromCustomers, ifrs-full:InvestmentsOtherThanInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod, ifrs-full:LiabilitiesIncludedInDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSale, ifrs-full:DebtSecurities, ifrs-full:PropertyPlantAndEquipment, ifrs-full:SubordinatedLiabilities All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9627] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests with a value of -134,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.esma.europa.eu/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-320000 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of 134,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.esma.europa.eu/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-610000. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests : -6 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -6 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/9695005MSX1OYEMGDF46/2021-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/bpce-2021-12-31-fr.zip/bpce-2021-12-31-fr/reports/bpce-2021-12-31-fr.xhtml 232580
